column4: BiPolah: As I *really* should get going, I'll just throw this out here: At what point in time during boot-up does the noise start? Could be a case of fiddling with module parameters instead if it starts before pulseaudio is loaded...
might be when X is starting up, not sure
In the latter case, BiPolah might very well be right in assuming a pulseaudio problem but I can't help either
